flags.name: --price-per-unit
flags.validation: Must be numeric and less than 1000000.

flags.name: --status
flags.validation: If rated is a Tender, status must be active.

flags.name: --importance
flags.validation: Must be one of the server-defined importance enums (e.g., low, default, high, high_001).

flags.name: --maximum-travel-minutes
flags.validation: Must be >= 0; only allowed for transportation hour/exclusive hour service types.

permissions: Allowed if the rated resource is permitted to be created by the user via its policy; if the broker requires explicit rate editing permission, user must be a rate editor member of the broker.
side_effects: Updates the rate record and may touch related rated records (e.g., rate agreements) and time card data via callbacks.
validation_notes: Requires a rate ID argument. At least one updatable attribute flag must be provided or the command fails. Server validates rated_type is one of: Tender, CustomerTender, BrokerTender, Retainer, CustomerRetainer, BrokerRetainer, RateAgreement. currency_code must be USD. price_per_unit must be numeric and < 1000000. maximum_travel_minutes must be >= 0; it must be absent unless the service type unit of measure is transportation hour or exclusive hour. If rated is a Tender, status must be active.
